docs.lead_paragraph: GLOBAL SHORTAGE A drought that led to the collapse of rice production in Australia is contributing to skyrocketing prices around the world. EBAY'S MR. FIX-IT John Donahoe, chief executive of eBay, has made a number of radical changes to the way the company operates, and the effect was beginning to be seen in the company's financial results, including a 22 percent increase in net income from the year ago quarter. [C1.]

docs.lead_paragraph: If you do not have to be anywhere for a while, pop on over to PastaQueen, a blog chronicling the experience of Jennette Fulda, a 27-year-old Web designer in Indianapolis who has spent the past three years shedding nearly half of her body weight. When she started, she weighed 372 pounds. Last time I checked the update on her blog, she was down to 182 pounds.
docs.abstract: Shedding excess pounds, and blogging about it, leads to a career makeover for one young woman.
docs.snippet: Shedding excess pounds, and blogging about it, leads to a career makeover for one young woman.

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON -- Is "McCain Defeats Clinton" about as likely as the infamous "Dewey Defeats Truman?" Or did she mean "Obama Defeats Clinton" as the penultimate, wrong projection in the nearer future?
docs.abstract: You have to guess. But you better believe it's one where the editors got it wrong.
docs.snippet: You have to guess. But you better believe it's one where the editors got it wrong.

docs.lead_paragraph: Often, it seems, special interests are finding that buying up judges likely to side with them in big-dollar cases is a good investment.

docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. David A. Paterson and his wife earned $269,815 in income in 2007 but gave only one charitable donation, worth $150, for the year, according to tax returns.
